title: Ticket #3469: Use Attributes in Vars for DAGMan
description:
Igor would like a line like 
VARS +A="\"foo\""
to work such that he could use 
$$([A])
in the submit file. As it is, DAGMan barfs on such an input line.

Igor considers this a bug. TJ considers it a feature request.
remarks:
2013-Jan-29 12:34:51 by nwp:
I have code on master that implements this. First iteration ran successfully in Batlab. Now added a regression test to job_dagman_vars test and am running that in Batlab.

2013-Jan-29 15:37:12 by nwp:
Pushed onto V7_9-gittrac_3469-branch

2013-Feb-01 13:59:51 by wenger:
I made a few cleanups and pushed this back to the main repository. Nathan -- you can go ahead and merge to the master if you think my changes are okay...

2013-Feb-01 14:25:58 by nwp:
Merged into master.
